pr_title: Expose Toxiproxy control port and proxy name

timeline.message:
Expose Toxiproxy control port and proxy name

In order to work with and external Toxiproxy client we need the control
port to get the mapped port and the proxy names to interact with.

timeline.bodyText: could you please revert this change and add getControlPort instead? We find it more flexible than exposing constants
timeline.author: bsideup

replies.bodyText: Sure, do you want to expose the original or the mapped port?
replies.author: aartigao

replies.bodyText: the mapped one, so that it can be used as an argument to the client
replies.author: bsideup

timeline.message:
Accessor for Toxiproxy mapped control port

Hidden the port constant again and created accessor for Toxiproxy
mapped control port.
